text: Carrie is an American teen horror movie. It is set in Maine and was released on 18 October 2013. It is a remake of the 1976 movie of the same name. It had previously been remade in 2002. Starring in this are ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, Julianne Moore and Judy Greer; Moretz plays Carrie White. title: Carrie (2013 movie)
